answerText: Lake Titicaca[10] This other South American Lake is located in the Altiplano Mountains in Bolivia. It is noted for its extremely high salinity rate and most of its water comes from a river that flows from Titicaca.
heading: NASAT |2013 | 4 | 18 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: Artificial islands on this lake are known as the Uros. For 10 points each: [10] Name this highest navigable lake in the world, a lake in the Andes on the border of Peru and Bolivia.
